title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1700.7 - Consideration of equities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1700.7 - Consideration of equities

State Regulations

In issuing orders under these regulations, the division
may take into consideration all factors bearing upon the equities involved, with due regard for preservation of the subject housing, the rights of the
tenants and the public interest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1700.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
